name: Cultivation Unlimited
description:
This is a game design project that I am currently working on. This class is based on Procedurally Generated games and I've decided to work on this game as a solo portfolio piece.

Controls:

W,A,S,D

Mouse to Aim

Left Click to Attack

M to Open Map

K to Open Stats

Esc to Open Pause Menu

Mod Menu - I'm not telling you :P

** Levels do have a chance to spawn without the ability to reach the exit if that happens you can just open the menu and press Reset Floor!!
